content: Construct a paragraph where all words start with the letter "g".

Gazing gracefully, gregarious geese gathered, gobbling gleaming grains. Glittering gold glittered gorgeously. Gigantic galaxies glowed grandly, generating gravitational genies. Ghostly ghouls giggled grotesquely, greeting guests generously. Green grass grew gracefully, guarding gentle gardens. Glorious gusts gushed gently, guiding graceful globes. Global governance guaranteed growth, granting global greatness. Government guaranteed guaranteed gains, generating global goodwill. Greatness grew grandly, guaranteeing global glory.
